title: Remove site logo and all logo-management features across the app

requirements.text: Remove all logo rendering from the UI so that no logo image is displayed anywhere in the app, including the site header, mobile menu header area, and footer.
acceptanceCriteria: No or component renders the logo asset at /assets/generated/eyegic-logo.dim_1536x864.png anywhere in the UI.
SiteHeader no longer imports or renders BrandLogo, including in the desktop header and mobile Sheet menu.
SiteFooter no longer imports or renders BrandLogo.

requirements.text: Remove the Branding/Logo settings UI entry points and route so users cannot navigate to or manage a logo through the frontend.
acceptanceCriteria: The '/settings/branding' route is removed from the router configuration (frontend/src/App.tsx).
All navigation links/buttons to Branding Settings are removed from SiteHeader and SiteFooter (including the mobile menu item).
The BrandingLogoPage is no longer reachable via navigation or routing.

requirements.text: Remove frontend logo-fetch/upload logic and any now-unused utilities related to logo byte-to-data-url conversion.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/hooks/branding/useSiteLogo.ts is removed or no longer referenced anywhere in the frontend build.
frontend/src/utils/logoDataUrl.ts is removed or no longer referenced anywhere in the frontend build.
The app compiles with zero references to getLogo/setLogo actor methods and zero references to LogoType from the frontend.

requirements.text: Remove backend logo storage and APIs so the canister no longer supports uploading or retrieving a site logo.
acceptanceCriteria: backend/main.mo no longer defines LogoType, persistentLogo state, or exposes getLogo()/setLogo() methods.
Backend builds successfully and the Candid interface no longer includes logo-related methods.
No new migration file is introduced unless required by compilation/upgrade constraints.

requirements.text: Remove the bundled static logo asset usage and ensure the repository no longer depends on the generated logo file.
acceptanceCriteria: No code references the static asset path '/assets/generated/eyegic-logo.dim_1536x864.png'.
If the file frontend/public/assets/generated/eyegic-logo.dim_1536x864.png exists, it is removed from the project or left unused with no runtime references.

constraints: Backend must remain a single-actor Motoko canister (all logic in backend/main.mo).
Do not modify any frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose existing components instead.
nonGoals: Do not redesign the overall site layout beyond removing logo-related UI elements.
Do not add new branding features (themes, fonts, colors) as a replacement for the removed logo.
Do not introduce any new authentication method beyond existing Internet Identity usage.
